EmailTemplate.subject: The Challenge - Assessment Reminder
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Please do not respond to this email. The email was sent from an unattended mailbox and responses are not reviewed. Please instead contact your staffing representative on {!Contact.Contact_Owner_alternative_email__c} Dear {!Contact.Name},
This is a reminder that you are booked to attend a group assessment on {!Staffing_Event_Day__c.Day_date__c}.
What should I do?
Please log into the Staffing Website and go to 'Booking Assessments'. Here, you will be able to review: https://staffing.the-challenge.org
Date, time and location of your booked assessment .
What you will need to prepare
The type of ID documents you will need to bring
If you have any problems on the day please contact your local staffing team.
Please ensure that you check for any changes to your assessment details the night before. These will be updated on the 'Assessment Booking Details' page no later than a day before the event.
NCS with The Challenge is an equal opportunities employer. If you have not already done so, please notify us of any disability that you have that may require reasonable adjustment on our part during the assessment.
What if I can no longer attend?
Please contact us as soon as possible if you are not able to attend this assessment so that we can offer your place to another candidate. We will try to offer you an alternative assessment date, but unfortunately this is not always possible.
Please note: if you are no longer able to attend and do not let us know in advance we may no longer be able to process your application.
If you have any questions, please contact me quoting the email reference number below in any correspondence.
We look forward to meeting you!
Best wishes NCS with The Challenge
{!Contact.OwnerFullName}
